content:
The chunk is situated within a comprehensive overview of PGui C++ modules, providing an introduction to various UI components such as buttons, sliders, and scroll bars. It lists common Direct* widgets used for creating graphical user interfaces in Panda3D applications.

(work in progress, more to come soon.)

directbutton directcheckbutton directradiobutton directdialog directentry directframe directlabel directoptionmenu directscrolledlist directwaitbar directslider directscrollbar directscrolledframe
